thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 2 of 69
thread.title: Irene B
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Irene B

author: Irene B
title: Irene B
text:
I recently ordered a PC1000 whole house water filter. From initial contact to tech info on installation, dealing with Pelican was a pleasure!
I wish all household improvements were this easy!
Also- our water quality is much better than with our previous system from Culligan.
